trans-unit.source: A Flake8 plugin for checking executable permissions and shebangs.
trans-unit.target: 一个Flake8插件,用于检查可执行权限和shebangs。

trans-unit.source: EXE001: Shebang is present but the file is not executable.
EXE002: The file is executable but no shebang is present.
trans-unit.target: EXE002。文件可以执行,但没有shebang的存在。

trans-unit.source: EXE003: Shebang is present but does not contain "python".
trans-unit.target: EXE003.Shebang是存在的,但不包含 "python"。Shebang是存在的,但不包含 "python"。

trans-unit.source: EXE004: There is whitespace before shebang.
EXE005: There are blank or comment lines before shebang.
Normally, after flake8-executable is installed, invoking flake8 will also run this plugin. For more details, check out the Flake8 plugin page.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在安装了flake8-executable之后，调用flake8也将运行此插件。有关更多详细信息，请查看Flake8插件页面。

trans-unit.source: This is a Flake8 plugin that ensures the executable permissions and shebangs of Python files are correctly set. Specifically, it checks the following errors:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个Flake8插件，可确保正确设置可执行文件权限和Python文件的shebang。具体来说，它检查以下错误：

trans-unit.source: Very often, developers mess up the executable permissions and shebangs of Python files. For example, sometimes the executable permission was accidentally granted, sometimes it is forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 很多时候,开发者会把Python文件的可执行权限和shebangs搞乱。例如,有时不小心授予了可执行权限,有时又忘记了。

trans-unit.source: You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with flake8-executable. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
trans-unit.target: 您应该已经获得了GNU通用通用公共许可证的副本以及flake8-executable。如果没有，请参阅https://www.gnu.org/licenses/。
flake8-executable 的发布是希望它是有用的,但没有任何保证,甚至没有对适销性或适用于某一特定用途的默示保证。更多细节请参见 GNU Lesser General Public License。

trans-unit.source: flake8-executable is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
trans-unit.target: flake8-executable 是自由软件:你可以在自由软件基金会发布的 GNU Lesser General Public License(GNU Lesser General Public License)的条款下重新发布它和/或修改它,可以是License的第 3 版,也可以是(由你选择)任何更新的版本。
